header.title: Team Projects
header.subtitle: Short links to tools, datasets, and publications

projects.title: GeoNotes
projects.description: Web-based platform to publish geoscience research and educational notes. Explore 'ALQUBALEE Notes' as an example.

projects.title: OpenGeo
projects.description: A living index of open geoscience software, datasets, and courses that keeps researchers, educators, and students aligned on the latest collaborative tools.

projects.title: Local AI
projects.description: A local generative AI platform designed for interaction with open-source AI models, enabling text, image, and audio generation.

projects.title: MEGTScale
projects.description: The Middle East Geologic Time Scale project, led by Dr. Al-Husseini and Dr. Alqubalee, aims to enhance the understanding of the region's geological history.

projects.title: GeoGallery
projects.description: Explore our geological photo collection - coming soon!

projects.title: GeoPrompts
projects.description: A prompt library of Earth's imagined features, based on geoscientists' descriptions and visualized with large language models (LLMs) - coming soon!
